About

Just one year later, I‚Äôve learned so much, yet my eagerness for learning the tools of the trade has grown even stronger. I‚Äôm hungry to provide solutions for people with my code!

Projects

Wildlife Watcher

A labour of love, I made this app to fulfill a wish I had to keep track of the wildlife in my local area.

I wanted to create the entire project with vanilla JavaScript and PHP to ensure I had a depth of knowledge before moving on to learn any frameworks.

Personal highlights: Utilisation of database indexes to categorise content per animal type, species or name. Longitude and latitude recognition for Google Maps API. Components made from scratch.

  • JavaScript
  • Google Maps API
  • Tailwind CSS
  • Image handling
  • REST API
  • PHP
  • MySQL

PHEM - Mechatronics Engineering

During my studies at TAFE, a class-wide competition took place to create a Wordpress website for a clients‚Äô mechatronics business.

After my pitch, thankfully the client chose my creation as the website they would use moving forward.

Personal highlights: Deep research on industry specific requirements and competitor websites. Providing a client with my product to support their business.

  • Wordpress
  • Customised PHP theme
